name: Untitled Dice Game
description:
A *very* simple game.

You are a dice, scroll the mouse wheel to choose your face.

Enemy dice are chasing you, you must shoot all of them to move to the next level.

You can kill enemy dice only when you choose a face same as them and shoot.

You die if an enemy dice comes too close to you.

PS. 

This is my first time using the Godot engine and also uploading the game to itch.io :D
